alert.note: Alert for Dauphin (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 26 at 4:08PM EDT until June 26 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Dauphin County in south central Pennsylvania... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 408 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Middletown, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hershey, Middletown, Palmyra, Royalton, Hershey Park and Penn State College Of Medicine. This includes The Pennsylvania Turnpike from mile markers 251 to 257. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
